originalText.text: my nails turned out really good, but they seem to not be super sanitary here. I had originally a gel set with gems that I wanted removed before getting the set pictured belowâ€¦ the lady clipped off the gems to soak my old nails off but instead of throwing away the gems like any regular nail place, she took some of them and put them in a drawer and then threw all the other clippings away. I was so shocked because why are you keeping a clients old nail gems in your desk drawers??  Itâ€™s disgusting and makes me think that she wanted to use the gems for her own nails or a future clients nails! She didnâ€™t even try to sanitize them or anything, I was shocked. they are an unsanitary nail spot.

originalText.text: Months ago this place changed management and have new nail techs. I think this is important to know because this isnâ€™t my first time but my recent visit I am very impressed. I came in on a Tuesday morning which is not a busy time for them. Everything was great. My pedicure was thorough and Alexandria was spot on with my nails! I got dip powder with gel polish design. Im beyond pleased and I will be back! Thank you!!!
